description: In this Project training you will extend your basic knowledge of working with MS Project. You will learn how to use budgets, how to work with overtime and the task calendar and how to create and apply different views. Additionally we will show you how to create reports and tables and how to edit them. You will also learn how to work with baselines and the resource pool. In the end we will explain the use of templates and how to export data to other programs.
title: Learn Microsoft Project 2010 -The Advanced Training-
instructors: LernFilme.com High quality video trainings for workplace learning. LernFilme.com
